sentences: Linus HÃ¶glund (born 25 March 1997), better known as Hogland, is a Swedish music producer, DJ and songwriter.
He started his career in 2015 with his first song "The Night", which placed itself in the top 3 of the Swedish Spotify Viral 50 list.
During the summer of 2019 he released the song "Letting Go" together with the singer KIDDO.
Hogland has now amassed over 130 million streams on Spotify, and has been IFPI certifield gold in Sweden.
